resources:
Who Wants to be a Mirannaire
// Strings used for the title screen view rules Difficulty normal hard brutal maniac Who Wants To Be A Mirannaire Rules Enable Dev Mode? Each round contains ten multiple choice questions. Choose the right answer for each of them within the allotted time to win.\n\nChoosing a wrong answer or running out of time on a question will darken one of the x\'s at the top of the screen. When all three of them turn red you will lose the round.\n\nTap of the difficulty of your choice to begin. Higher difficulties will naturally have harder questions, but they also have a higher score multiplier. Will you risk losing all of your x\'s for a chance at the high score?\n\nOh, and before I go, if you manage to reach the end with at least two of your x\'s intact, you\'ll receive a bonus question about yours truly for a chance at even more points! It isn\'t easy to get that far, so I will be kind enough to stop the timer if you get there. Maybe you\'ll have a small chance because of it.\n\nMay Aidos be on your side. You will need her guiding hand.\n~ Campanella
// Strings used for QuestionFragment UI score time left Enter your response You got a bonus question correct, that is an extra 1500 points! You got a bonus question wrong. There is no penalty, but you don\'t get any points. Submit
// Strings for ResultFragment UI Are you sure you\'re really a Kiseki fan? I don\'t know why else you would be here. Try putting some effort into your answers. You didn\'t fail, but you didn\'t really do that well either. Try a little harder or increase the difficulty and maybe you\'ll see some results. Wow, even I didn\'t know the answers to some of those questions. You must be a bona-fide Kiseki fan! Maybe you should see if you can conquer Maniac mode. You must have put a lot of work in to get this far. Just sit back and take a second to relax. You\'ve truly earned it. You scored a total of %1$d points and achieved a player rank of %2$d!

// Quiz questions What\'s the last name of our ultra-dependable protagonist, Estelle? What\'s the first name of Estelle\'s late mother? What\'s the name of harmonica-playing heartthrob Joshua\'s blood-related sister? What\'s the first name of softer-than-he-looks bracer Agate\'s late sister? What is the color of \'Cuteness is justice!\' advocate Anelace\'s hair ribbon? What branch of the Bracer Guild is cuteness maniac Anelace attached to? What relation is Duke Dunan to Queen Alicia? What\'s the first name of Prince Olivert\'s father, the current reigning emperor of Erebonia? What\'s the name of the large lake situated in the center of Liberl? What\'s the name of the vast area of woodland in the southeastern part of the Rolent region? What was the name that Captain Schwarz went by when disguised as a sister during the first game\'s finale? What did Estelle ask her parents for during the dream sequence in Second Chapter, Chapter 4? What\'s the name of hardcore sneaker collector Estelle\'s favorite brand? What\'s the name of the now-deceased father of Kilika, the woman in charge of Zeiss\' Bracer Guild branch? What\'s the name of the Bracer Guild training facility situated in Leman State? What\'s the name of black-haired darling Joshua\'s most-played harmonica song? What\'s the name of the huge drawbridge that connects the north and south sides of Ruan City? What\'s the name of the Aureole guardian which the party fight in the Sealed Area at the end of the first game? What is depicted on the emblem of the Erebonian Empire? What was the name of the play performed at the festival held in Jenis Royal Academy in the first game, Chapter 2? What\'s the number of Ouroboros Enforcer Bleublanc, the Phantom Thief? What\'s the number of Ouroboros Enforcer Luciola, the Bewitching Bell? What\'s the number of Ouroboros Enforcer Walter, the Direwolf? What\'s the number of Ouroboros Enforcer Renne, the Angel of Slaughter? What was the number of Ouroboros Enforcer Joshua, the Black Fang? What\'s the number of Ouroboros Enforcer Leonhardt, the Bladelord? What is the name of Princess Klaudia\'s late father? What was the name of Liberl\'s previous monarch before Queen Alicia took the throne? How many monarchs has Liberl had since its founding, including the current monarch, Queen Alicia? Who has the dubious honor of being rejected by both Marsha in Grancel in the first game and Aina in Rolent in Second Chapter? What is the name of the current president of Calvard? What is the title held by Fisherman\'s Guild member Percy? What is the name of the elder of the two twins who work in Edel Market in Grancel? Alan, who works at Rolent\'s landing port, has a habit of rating every girl he sees. Which of the following earned 100 points? What color is the Cecilia, one of the airships that transports people around Liberl? What color is the international airship, the Gretna, that connects Liberl and surrounding nations? What is the name of the state situated between Erebonia and Calvard that both countries assert ownership of? What was the name of the expensive wine that Olivier drank at the Anterose in Chapter 1 of the first game? What was the meaning of the name Leonhardt offered by Olivier when he encountered him in Second Chapter, Chapter 5? What is the major of Jenis Royal Academy student Kloe Rinz? The Orbal Compatibility Tester at the festival in the first game shows the date on which sweet Estelle was born. When was it? The Orbal Compatibility Tester at the festival in FC shows the date on which Joshua was born. When was it? What is the combination to open the road lamp on the Milch Main Road in the quest given to you by Freddy in FC\'s prologue? Which chapter of The Doll Knight was Bleublanc\'s second card hidden inside during the quest in Second Chapter, Chapter 3? What is the name of the late husband of Matron Theresa, who runs Mercia Orphanage in Ruan? What is the name of famed angler and bearer of the Master Fisher rank Lloyd\'s niece? How many dishes of Imperial cuisine is the head chef at Grancel Castle said to be able to make? Which of the following pairs are not a couple? In the first game\'s Kitty-Talk for Dummies book, what does Nyayayaa～ mean? In the first game\'s Kitty-Talk for Dummies book, what does Nyaa mean? How many Creepy Sheep take part in the race\'s ultimate technique, Sheep Asura Fuse? What\'s the nickname of Deen, the green-haired member of the Raven gang? There are a large number of different Pom enemies in the two previous games, but how many varieties are there in total? Weissmann\'s S-Craft quote begins with, \'Can you feel it?\' but what does he say after that? Which of the following is the correct description for the Shadow Spear art? Which of these is the beginning of the description for the orbal art Death Scream? What\'s the name of the quartz that makes enemies more likely to notice you? The Yin-Yang quartz combines the effects of which two others? The quartz \'Heaven\'s Eye\' combines the effects of which two other quartz? This question relates to Second Chapter. How many fishing spots are there in Liberl in total? What is the origin of the name of Renne\'s S-Craft, Rennede? What is the name of the vocal track that plays during the credits of FC? What is the name of the vocal track that plays during the credits of SC? What is the name of FC\'s final dungeon theme? What is the name of the regular battle theme in FC? What is the name of the regular battle theme in SC? What are the first two words of the SC opening vocal, Silver Will, Golden Wings? One arge, a unit of length in the Trails series, is equivalent to how many real-world meters?" One selge, a unit of length in the Trails series, is equivalent to how many real-world meters? One rege, a unit of length in the Trails series, is equivalent to how many real-world meters? One torim, a unit of weight in the Trails series, is equivalent to how many real world kilograms? What is the maximum mira you can have at once? How many different loading screen animations are there in all in FC? How many different loading screen animations are there in all in the 3rd? What is the maximum playtime that can be displayed on the Camp Menu? What is the name of the Trails series\' currency? Which of these is not part of the lyrics to Olivier\'s beloved tune, Amber Amour? What is the name of the continent on which the Trails series takes place? What is the name given to the emblem of the Bracer Guild, a peace-keeping organization? Which of the following is not a statistic that appears in the game? On the title screen, Campanella has one leg behind the other and one hand behind his back. Which two choices fit those conditions? The quiz is almost over, and I feel the host has really gotten to know you. Do you remember his name?
